articles.author: Phil Thomas
articles.title: Trump demands 'reparations' from China over Covid: 'They must pay' - The Independent
articles.description: Former president, who had an ambiguous relationship with Beijing while in office, says Asian superpower must pay at least $10 trillion
articles.content:
Donald Trump has called for China to pay reparations to the United States for the damage done by Covid-19, which originated in the city of Wuhan.
At a rare speech to a Republican convention in Green… [+4273 chars]

articles.title: Taiwan's Covid-19 deaths break single-day record, Asia News - AsiaOne
articles.description: Taiwan reported 37 new Covid-19 deaths on Saturday – its highest single-day total. Taiwan’s Central Epidemic Command Centre said 476 new local cases and 35 cases delayed by a reporting backlog had been reported, bringing the total number of cases on the islan…
articles.content:
Taiwan reported 37 new Covid-19 deaths on Saturday its highest single-day total.

articles.title: Covid-19 vaccine: Over 80% sign-up rate among Singapore students in graduating cohorts - AsiaOne
